====================================================
# Audio-Visual Services Tender Invitation

## Tender Announcement Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-9302-85872944
* **Amendment Number:** 5
* **Solicitation Number:** T8080-230209
* **Publication Date:** 2023-09-20
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-23T15:00:00 (Expired)
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-10-23

## Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-11-13
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-11-15

## Background and Requirements

Transport Canada invites proposals for Audio-Visual services for the Fall 2023 National Canadian Marine Advisory Council (CMAC) meeting, scheduled for November 13-15, 2023 at the Shaw Centre in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. The selected contractor will be responsible for providing audio-visual equipment and technical support for the meeting.

## Proposal and Submission Details

The tender process is competitive and open to all qualified bidders. The selected contractor will be chosen based on variations or combinations of the following criteria:
* Best price proposal
* Technical merit of the proposal
* Quality of service and support

## Important Notice

* The trade agreements listed below apply to this tender:
  * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  * North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
  * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* The tender documents are available for download from [CanadaBuys Canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
* Interested parties should submit their proposals electronically through the CanadaBuys platform.

## Contact Information

For inquiries, please contact:

* Keevin Falk
* Email: [keevin.falk@tc.gc.ca](mailto:keevin.falk@tc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (204) 430-386
